verse.intent: Warm, intimate lead vocal sitting slightly behind the choir

param_why.high_pass_freq: 85 Hz removes rumble without thinning the chest resonance
param_why.low_mid_cut_freq: 300 Hz is where vocal mud accumulates in a dense gospel mix
param_why.low_mid_cut_gain: -2.5 dB cleans low-mid buildup while staying natural

chain.why: Clean low-end before compression so dynamics react to vocal content

param_why.threshold: -18 dB catches louder phrases while preserving softer lines
param_why.release: 80 ms recovers before the next phrase

chain.why: Even vocal dynamics for stable placement in a choir-heavy mix

chorus.intent: Larger and brighter lead that rides over choir and organ

param_why.threshold: Extra control for louder chorus phrases

chain.why: Keep chorus vocal steady and up front

background_vocals.intent: Soft widened layers that support the lead without masking

param_why.dry_wet: Higher wet blend pushes backgrounds back

chain.why: Place background vocals behind the lead in shared ambience

adlibs.intent: Airy accents with movement and extra space

chain.why: Create rhythmic space around adlib moments

notes: Seed librarian entry for implementation validation
